functional_units.name: dinf Container Registration
functional_units.description: Registers a dedicated parser for the 'dinf' container in BoxParserRegistry.

functional_units.name: dref Data Reference Parsing
functional_units.description: Parses 'dref' data reference boxes, decoding entry counts, types, version/flags, and location payloads (URL/URN) while preserving byte ranges for UI annotations.

functional_units.name: ParsedBoxPayload Extension with DataReferenceBox Model
functional_units.description: Extends ParsedBoxPayload to include a structured DataReferenceBox model used by JSON exporter and downstream clients.

functional_units.name: JSON Exporter Integration
functional_units.description: Exports parsed data reference information in JSON format, including data reference collections within track nodes.

functional_units.name: CLI JSON Snapshot Generation
functional_units.description: Generates CLI snapshots that reflect updated data reference collections for UI/CLI output synchronization.
